title: Episode 88: Matt Timms & Rachel Wharton
description: This week on Let’s Eat In, Matt Timms and Rachel Wharton, co-hosts of their own show on Heritage Radio Network, join Cathy Erway to talk cookies–both for Hannukah and Christmas. Tune in to hear why Matt abhors eating on first dates, Rachel’s recipe for a perfect pasta carbonara, and Cathy’s experience as a sausage-making class. This episode is sponsored by Hearst Ranch.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
